title: Publish Version 9 (go live) with valid production slug

requirements.text: When publishing Version 9, ensure the production domain/slug used for the live deployment passes validation (5–50 characters; only letters, numbers, and hyphens). If the requested slug is missing or invalid, block publishing and show a clear, user-facing error message in English explaining the rule and requesting a corrected slug.

quotes: There is nothing to adjust just help me to make this version 9 to go live and publish it

acceptanceCriteria: If a production slug is invalid (wrong length or contains characters other than letters/numbers/hyphens), publishing does not proceed.
The user sees an English error message stating: the slug must be 5–50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens.
If a valid slug is provided, the publish flow can proceed (no slug-validation-related blockage).

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Backend remains single-actor; only add backend changes if strictly required for publishing.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: No new Valentine page sections, content changes, or visual redesign.
No changes to Memories gallery behavior, Edit Panel fields, or localStorage persistence beyond what is required to complete publishing.
